about_the_game:
🌟 What's New?
Dive back into the world of CyVenge with an exclusive new color for your main character! While it may seem like a small change, this unique hue represents something much bigger - your support for solo developers like me, Mario.



👾 Why This DLC?
"Support a Solo Dev" is more than just an add-on; it's a statement. By purchasing this DLC, you're directly contributing to the ongoing development and creativity behind CyVenge. In appreciation of your support, I've made the base game completely free to play! This means more adventures, more action, and an ever-expanding universe, all thanks to supporters like you.

💖 A Token of Gratitude
As a solo developer, every bit of support counts. This DLC is my way of saying thank you. Your purchase helps me continue doing what I love - creating immersive gaming experiences that transport you to another world.

🌍 Join the Community
Be part of a passionate community of gamers who believe in supporting independent game development. Share your experiences, suggest ideas, and help shape the future of CyVenge.

🌟 Your Support, My Inspiration
Every DLC purchase fuels my passion and capability to bring more exciting content and updates to the CyVenge universe. You're not just buying a color; you're investing in the game's future and in the dreams of a solo developer.

🚀 Ready to Make a Difference?
Your journey in CyVenge awaits, now with more flair and a heartwarming cause. Grab the "Support a Solo Dev" DLC now and be a part of something bigger!
